title: Audra Hardt - No Disguise (FLAC)
description:
Audra Hardt - No Disguise (FLAC)

"No Disguise" is passionate, modern rock with a power pop soul. Audra's lyrics will set your heart afire while driving melodies course through your veins.

If you love the powerful commanding lyrics of Alanis Morissette, the playful melodic hooks of Jill Sobule, and the heartfelt passion and sincerity of Sarah McLachlan, then you're going to love China Cat's debut CD, "No Disguise."

Bonus tracks include a fantastic cover of Jefferson Airplane's "White Rabbit."


01 - Off U Go (4:15)
